solution_line_template: These friends have invited another {total_friends} friends * {friends_brought} = <<{total_friends}*{friends_brought}={additional_guests}>>{additional_guests} people.
So in total, there are {total_friends} friends + {additional_guests} people = <<{total_friends}+{additional_guests}={total_people}>>{total_people} people going to Michonne’s party.
